sentences.sentence: The advert was trying to "show the ugliness of the illness, not of aids victims", he added.
sentences.translation: 他补充道，这则广告旨在“显示这个疾病的丑陋，而不是艾滋病患者本身。”

sentences.sentence: No doubt we will remember a 20th century way of life beyond comprehension for its ugliness.
sentences.translation: 毫无疑问，我们会记得20世纪的生活方式，其丑陋令人难以理解。
